verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> chish-Mo-a' heard כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei And it came to pass when all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֡י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver which [were] on the side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den of Jordan יָ֗מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, westward וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all מַלְכֵ֤י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei and all the kings הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, which [were] by the sea אֵ֠ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> ho-Vish had dried up יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֵ֧י <S%H4325><s%> mei the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den of Jordan מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until; עָבְרָנוּ 'a-ve-ra-nu כעָבְרָ֑ם <S%H5674><s%> 'a-ve-Ram; alienate קוַיִּמַּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> vai-yim-Mas melted לְבָבָ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vam, that their heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah came בָ֥ם vam עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od any ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, neither was there spirit מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei in them any more because בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', unto Joshua עֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh Make לְךָ֖ le-Cha חַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H2719><s%> char-Vot knives צֻרִ֑ים <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Rim; thee sharp וְשׁ֛וּב <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shuv again מֹ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> mol and circumcise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שֵׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit. the second time

וַיַּעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'as- made ל֥וֹ lo יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua חַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H2719><s%> char-Vot knives צֻרִ֑ים <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Rim; him sharp וַיָּ֙מָל֙ <S%H4135><s%> vai-Ya-mol and circumcised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at גִּבְעַ֖ת <S%H1389><s%> giv-'At at the hill הָעֲרָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H6190><s%> ha-'a-ra-Lot. of the foreskins

וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var And this [is] the cause אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- why מָ֣ל <S%H4135><s%> mal did circumcise יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a'; why Joshua כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am All the people הַיֹּצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-Tze that came out מִמִּצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt הַזְּכָרִ֜ים <S%H2145><s%> haz-ze-cha-Rim [that were] males כֹּ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> kol all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei [even] all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war מֵ֤תוּ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu died בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> vam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech, by the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-Tam after they came out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Now מֻלִ֣ים <S%H4135><s%> mu-Lim were circumcised הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu, become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all the people הַיֹּֽצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-tze-'Im; that came out וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'om but all the people הַיִּלֹּדִ֨ים <S%H3209><s%> hai-yil-lo-Dim [that were] born בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech by the way בְּצֵאתָ֥ם <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-Tam as they came forth מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not מָֽלוּ׃ <S%H4135><s%> Ma-lu. [them] they had not circumcised

כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu walked בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- For the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until תֹּ֨ם <S%H8552><s%> tom were consumed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּ֜וֹי <S%H1471><s%> hag-Goy till all the people אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah of war הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> hai-yo-tze-'Im which came out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U because they obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto whom the LORD לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, לְבִלְתִּ֞י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti because הַרְאוֹתָ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> har-'o-Tam that he would not shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, them the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַֽאֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tam unto their fathers לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> La-tet that he would give לָ֔נוּ La-nu, אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz us a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Hem And their children הֵקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> he-Kim [whom] he raised up תַּחְתָּ֔ם <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tam, their place אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מָ֣ל <S%H4135><s%> mal circumcised יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a'; in their stead them Joshua כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because עֲרֵלִ֣ים <S%H6189><s%> 'a-re-Lim for they were uncircumcised הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu, become כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not מָ֥לוּ <S%H4135><s%> Ma-lu because they had not circumcised אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech. them by the way

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- they תַּ֥מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> Tam-mu And it came to pass when they had done כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> hag-Goy all the people לְהִמּ֑וֹל <S%H4135><s%> le-him-Mol; circumcising וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu that they abode תַחְתָּ֛ם <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tam their places בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> bam-ma-cha-Neh in their places in the camp עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until חֲיוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H2421><s%> cha-yo-Tam. till they were whole פ Peh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', unto Joshua הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, This day גַּלּ֛וֹתִי <S%H1556><s%> gal-Lo-ti have I rolled away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pat the reproach מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Chem; and וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra is called שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem from off you Wherefore the name הַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of the place הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he גִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> gil-Gal, Gilgal עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu encamped בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בַּגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> bag-gil-Gal; in Gilgal וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su and kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפֶּ֡סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh of the month בָּעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ba-'E-rev at even בְּעַֽרְב֥וֹת <S%H6160><s%> be-'ar-Vot in the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho. of Jericho

וַיֹּ֨אכְל֜וּ <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-che-Lu And they did eat מֵעֲב֥וּר <S%H5669><s%> me-'a-Vur of the old corn הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land מִמָּֽחֳרַ֥ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat on the morrow הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> hap-Pe-sach after the passover מַצּ֣וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot unleavened cakes וְקָל֑וּי <S%H7033><s%> ve-ka-Lui; and parched בְּעֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> be-'E-tzem [corn] in the selfsame הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. he

וַיִּשְׁבֹּ֨ת <S%H7673><s%> vai-yish-Bot ceased הַמָּ֜ן <S%H4478><s%> ham-Man And the manna מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> mi-mo-cho-Rat, on the morrow בְּאָכְלָם֙ <S%H398><s%> be-'a-che-Lam after they had eaten מֵעֲב֣וּר <S%H5669><s%> me-'a-Vur of the old corn הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei neither had the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מָ֑ן <S%H4478><s%> Man; manna וַיֹּאכְל֗וּ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-che-Lu, any more but they did eat מִתְּבוּאַת֙ <S%H8393><s%> mit-te-vu-'At of the fruit אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah that year הַהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi. he ס sa-Mek
